data.description:
Welcome to Cebus, a VR multiplayer game that offers an immersive open-world environment teeming with silly characters and endless possibilities.

In Cebus, you can customize your character to reflect your unique style and personality. With countless maps to explore, each offering a distinct environment and challenges, you’ll never run out of new places to discover.

Our game stands out with its unique visual style, designed to captivate and engage players of all ages. The vibrant colors, detailed environments, and quirky character designs make Cebus silly a visual treat.

Cebus offers a variety of unique game modes to keep you entertained. Navigate through a flooded jungle, race against time and other players, or reach the highest point in our vertical challenge. For those who prefer a more relaxed experience, our sandbox mode allows you to explore and interact with the world at your own pace.

One of the key features of Cebus is our scoring system, CPoints. As you participate in activities and overcome challenges, you’ll earn CPoints. These points allow you to advance and secure your spot on the global leaderboard. Whether you’re a competitive player aiming for the top or someone who enjoys the thrill of progression, our scoring system adds an extra layer of excitement to your gaming experience.

Join us in Cebus and embark on an unforgettable virtual adventure!
